ä½†æ˜¯ç”±äº ZeroTier çš„å®˜ç½‘åœ¨å›½å†…è®¿é—®è¾ƒæ…¢, æ¯æ¬¡éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡æ–°åŠ å…¥æˆå‘˜æˆ–è€…ç®¡ç†æˆå‘˜éƒ½è¦èŠ±ä¸€ç‚¹æ—¶é—´ç™»å½•å®˜ç½‘å¹¶ç®¡ç†, ä¸€å¼€å§‹è¿˜ä¸è§‰å¾—éº»çƒ¦, åæ¥åŠ å…¥æˆå‘˜è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤š, ä¹Ÿé‚€è¯·æœ‹å‹ä¸€èµ·åŠ å…¥, è¿™æ ·ç®¡ç†èµ·æ¥å°±æ¯”è¾ƒéº»çƒ¦. æ°å·§æ­¤æ—¶ä» ZeroTier å®˜ç½‘ä¸Šçœ‹åˆ°ä»–ä»¬æœ‰å®˜æ–¹çš„ API å¯ä¾›ç”¨æˆ·è°ƒç”¨, äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ç”³è¯·äº† API Key, çŸ­æš‚æµ‹è¯•ä¹‹åå†³å®šå†™ä¸€ä¸ª Telegram Bot å¸®åŠ©ç›‘æ§ä»¥åŠç®¡ç†æˆ‘çš„ ZeroTier Network.

æœ¬ bot ä½¿ç”¨ Telegram Bot çš„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹åº“ pyTelegramBotAPI æ¥å®ç°, ä»£ç éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸»è¦åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†:

åˆæœŸçš„ç‰ˆæœ¬é€šè¿‡åœ¨ config.yaml æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ· ID æ¥æ·»åŠ ç®¡ç†å‘˜, å¹¶é€šè¿‡ç§èŠ bot çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥å¯¹ Network è¿›è¡Œç®¡ç†. è¿™ç§äº¤äº’æ–¹å¼åœ¨ åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç®¡ç†å‘˜çš„æ—¶å€™è¿˜æ˜¯æŒºæ–¹ä¾¿çš„, åªéœ€è¦ç›´æ¥ä¸ bot ç§èŠå‘é€æŒ‡ä»¤, å¼€å‘åˆ°ä¸€å¤§åŠçš„æ—¶å€™å‘ç°ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒéš¾å®ç°çš„åŠŸèƒ½: å½“æœ‰å¤šä¸ªç®¡ç†å‘˜ç®¡ç†çš„æ—¶å€™, bot æ˜¾ç¤ºç®¡ç†ä¿¡æ¯ä¼šæ¯”è¾ƒå›°éš¾ (éœ€è¦åœ¨æ‰€æœ‰ç®¡ç†å‘˜å¯¹è¯æ¡†åŒæ­¥ä¿®æ”¹ä¿¡æ¯, ä»¥æ˜¾ç¤ºæ˜¯å“ªä½ç®¡ç†å‘˜è¿›è¡Œäº†æ­¤é¡¹æ“ä½œ).

Bot åŠŸèƒ½

  • Show networks info

åˆ›å»ºç§äºº ZeroTier Network ç®¡ç† Bot å…·ä½“æ­¥éª¤

å¼€å§‹

  1. åˆ›å»ºä½ çš„ ZeroTier Web API Token:

    ç‚¹å‡»é“¾æ¥åˆ›å»º API Access Token.

import requests

url = 'http://www.cjh.com.cn/sqindex.html'

class CjhData(object):
    def __init__(self):
        pass

    def get_data(self):
        r = requests.get(url)
        result = r.text.split()[66][:-1] # å»é™¤å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æœ€åçš„åˆ†å·
        return result

import pymysql


class DB(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self.con = pymysql.connect(host='localhost', user='root',
                                   password='password', database='yangtze_river_water_level')
        self.cur = self.con.cursor()

    def insert_data(self, oq, q, rvnm, stcd, stnm, tm, wptn, z):

        # æ£€æŸ¥æŸç«™æŸæ—¶é—´çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯å¦å·²å­˜å‚¨è¿‡, é¿å…é‡å¤å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®
        if self.cur.execute("select * from water_level where stnm=%s and tm=%s", (stnm, tm)) == 0:
            self.cur.execute("insert into water_level(oq, q, rvnm, stcd, stnm, tm, wptn, z) values (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)",
                             (oq, q, rvnm, stcd, stnm, tm, wptn, z))
            self.con.commit()
        else:
            pass

    def get_list_stnm(self):
        self.cur.execute("select distinct stnm from water_level")
        return self.cur.fetchall()
    
    def selectByStation(self, station):
        self.cur.execute("select * from water_level where stnm=%s", (station))
        data = self.cur.fetchall()
        return data


    def delete_duplicate(self):
        pass
    
    def __del__(self):
        self.cur.close()
        self.con.close()

åœ¨ä¸»å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°å, å°†çˆ¬å–åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®å­˜å…¥æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­:

import json
from get_cjh_data import CjhData
from database import DB

def main():
    cd = CjhData() # å®ä¾‹åŒ–çˆ¬è™«ç±»
    json_str = cd.get_data() # å¾—åˆ°jsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
    json_data = json.loads(json_str) # å°†jsonå­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æˆjsonå¯¹è±¡
    # print(json_data)

    db = DB() # å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œç±»
    for item in json_data:
        # å°†jsonå¯¹è±¡ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®éå†å­˜å…¥æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­
        db.insert_data(item['oq'], item['q'], item['rvnm'], item['stcd'], item['stnm'], item['tm']/1000, item['wptn'], item['z'])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

è¿è¡ŒæˆåŠŸå, æ‰“å¼€æ•°æ®åº“æ£€æŸ¥ç»“æœ:

ç»˜å›¾

ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨pythonç”»å›¾, æˆ‘ç®€å•å­¦äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ç½‘ä¸Šçš„ matplotlib çš„ demo, ä¿®æ”¹ä¸€äº›å‚æ•°å°±å¾—åˆ°äº†è‡ªå·±æƒ³è¦çš„å›¾ (è¿™ä¸ªæŠ˜çº¿å›¾ç®—æ˜¯æœ€åŸºç¡€çš„å›¾å½¢), æœ‰ä¸€äº›å°é…ç½®è¦å†™å¥½, æ¯”å¦‚æ›´æ¢å­—ä½“æ¥è®©ä¸­æ–‡å¾—ä»¥æ˜¾ç¤ºç­‰ç­‰:

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pylab import mpl
import numpy as np
import datetime
from database import DB

class DrawData(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self.db = DB()

    def draw(self):
        list_stnm = self.db.get_list_stnm()
        # ä¿®æ”¹å­—ä½“å®ç°ä¸­æ–‡æ˜¾ç¤º
        mpl.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Microsoft Yahei']
        fig, ax = plt.subplots()
        ax.set_xlabel("æ—¶é—´")
        ax.set_ylabel("æ°´ä½")
        ax.set_title("é•¿æ±Ÿæ²¿å²¸æ°´ä½ç»Ÿè®¡")

        for station in list_stnm:
            data = self.db.selectByStation(station)
            # print(data)

            list_tm = []
            list_z =[]
            for item in data:
                timedata = datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(item[6])
                list_tm.append(timedata)
                list_z.append(float(item[8]))

            ax.plot(list_tm, list_z, label=station)

        ax.legend()
        fig.autofmt_xdate()
        plt.show()

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# author: Chan

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

url_start = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/member.php?mod=logging&action=login&referer=http%3A%2F%2Fbt.neu6.edu.cn%2Fforum.php'
url_login = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/'
url_main = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/forum.php'
url_test = 'http://bt.neu6.edu.cn/home.php?mod=spacecp'


class neu6():
    def __init__(self, username, password):
        headers = {
            "Accept": "text/html, application/xhtml+xml, application/xml",
            "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate",
            "Accept-Language": "zh-CN, zh",
            "Cache-Control": "max-age = 0",
            "Connection": "keep-alive",
            "Host": "bt.neu6.edu.cn",
            "Upgrade-Insecure-Requests": "1",
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0Win64x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/66.0.3359.181 Safari/537.36"
        }
        self.session = requests.Session()
        self.session.headers.update(headers)
        self.username = username
        self.password = password

        r = self.session.get(url_start)
        soup = BeautifulSoup(r.content, 'html.parser')
        self.formhash = soup.find("input", {"name": "formhash"})["value"]
        self.action = soup.find("form")["action"]

    def login(self):
        try:
            formdata = {
                "formhash": self.formhash,
                "referer": url_main,
                "username": self.username,
                "password": self.password,
                "questionid": "0",
                "answer": ""
            }
            self.session.post(url_login+self.action+'&inajax=1', data=formdata)
            r1 = self.session.get(url_main)
        except:
            print("ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥")

    def info(self):
        try:
            r2 = self.session.get(url_main)
            soup = BeautifulSoup(r2.content, 'html.parser')
            name = soup.find_all("strong", {"class": "vwmy"})[0].get_text()
            points = soup.find_all("a", {"class": "showmenu"})[
                0].get_text().strip()
            level = soup.find_all("a", {"class": "xi2"})[
                0].get_text().strip()
            print("ç”¨æˆ·å:", name)
            print(points)
            print("ç”¨æˆ·ç»„:", level)
        except:
            print("è·å–ä¿¡æ¯å¤±è´¥")


def main():
    neu = neu6('username', 'passowrd')
    neu.login()
    neu.info()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
